article.name: Tetris Highscore
article.description:
A purely vain post. I\'ve been playing tetris every day since... I can remember, its that much fun, good test of the brain, keeps some parts of me nimble.
Still, even I was suprised when my score on the A-type mode rocketed way past 300,000 on 131 lines right through to the dizzy heights of 400,000. This is unprecedented for me.
Game type: A, starting level: 9, no music.
Top-Score: 1 MKV 416658. I am made of win.
article.keywords: made of win tetris high score game type a mkv starting level 9
